Class Tetronimo

  • java.lang.Object
    • wheelsunh.etc.AbstractGraphic
      • wheelsunh.users.AbstractShape
        • wheelsunh.users.ShapeGroup
          • models.Tetronimo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener, wheelsunh.etc.CustomGraphic, wheelsunh.Locatable, wheelsunh.Rotatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LLeft, LRight, LZigZag, RZigZag, Square, StraightLine, TShape

    public abstract class Tetronimo
extends wheelsunh.users.ShapeGroup
    Tetronimo.java: An abstract class to model the base capaabilities of a tetronimo
    See Also:
    Color

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tetronimo()
      Generates the four rectangles for the tetronino and puts them on the screen, they are at the default coordinates to start
